segment.source: Click on icon to fill in the review form.
segment.target: Klik di ikon untuk mengisi form review.

segment.source: Are you sure you wish to mark this task as completed? You may not be able to make changes afterwards.
segment.target: Apakah Anda yakin tugas ini telah selesai? Anda mungkin tidak bisa mengubahnya lagi.

segment.target: Ikutkan pengguna tanpa peran di jurnal ini.

segment.target: Apakah Anda bersedia mereview naskah yang diserahkan ke jurnal ini?

segment.source: Yes, I would like to be contacted with requests to review submissions to this journal.
Which journals on this site would you like to register with?
segment.target: Jurnal mana saja yang Anda pilih?

segment.source: If you requested to be a reviewer on any journal, please enter your subject interests.
segment.target: Jika Anda meminta peran sebagai reviewer, mohon sebutkan subjek yang Anda minati.

segment.source: Your account is not currently associated with any journals. Please choose a journal:
segment.target: Akun Anda tidak terdaftar ke jurnal apapun. Pilihlah satu jurnal:

segment.source: Your account does not currently have any roles for this journal. Please choose from the actions below:
segment.target: Akun Anda sekarang tidak mempunyai peran apapun di jurnal ini. Mohon tetapkan pilihan berikut:

segment.source: Submit an Article: Author registration is currently disabled.
segment.target: Penyerahan Naskah: Pendaftaran penulis belum dibuka.

segment.source: Register as a Reviewer: Reviewer registration is currently disabled.
segment.target: Pendaftaran Reviewer: Pendaftaran reviewer belum dibuka.

segment.source: You do not have an active subscription.
Individual subscriptions require login to access subscription content.
segment.target: Langganan individu perlu login untuk mengakses isi langganan.

segment.source: Institutional subscriptions do not require login. The user's domain and/or IP address is used to provide access to subscription content.
segment.target: Langganan institusi tidak perlu login. Domain pengguna dan/ atau alamat IP digunakan untuk menyediakan akses ke isi langganan.

segment.source: Note: Institutional subscriptions purchased online require approval of the domain and IP ranges before the subscription is activated.
segment.target: Catatan: Langganan institusi yang dibeli secara online memerlukan persetujuan domain dan IP sebelum langganan diaktifkan.

segment.source: Submission sent to issue scheduling queue
Subscription required to access item. To verify subscription, log in to journal.
segment.target: Untuk akses item, login ke jurnal.

segment.source:
Specifying a default authentication source other than OJS has the following effects:

  • If a user attempts to register a new account with this site with a username that exists on the authentication source (but not in the OJS database), the registration attempt is only allowed if the supplied password is valid for that user account.
segment.target:
Menetapkan sumber otentikasi selain OJS akan menimbulkan dampak berikut:

  • Jika pengguna hendak mendaftar akun baru ke situs ini dengan username yang telah ada di sumber otentikasi (namun belum ada di databasee OJS), pendaftaran hanya akan berhasil bila menggunakan password yang sama untuk username di sumber tersebut.

segment.source:
NOTE!

The system could not automatically overwrite the configuration file. To apply your configuration changes you must open config.inc.php in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.
segment.target:
Catatan!

Sistem tidak dapat secara otomatis menimpa file konfigurasi. Untuk menerapkan perubahan konfigurasi Anda, Anda harus membuka config.inc.php di text editor yang cocok dan mengganti isinya dengan isi text field di bawah ini.

segment.source: Article Galley Plugins add support for displaying different document types as article galleys.
segment.target: Plugin Galley Artikel memungkinkan ditampilkannya tipe dokumen yang berbeda sebagai galley artikel.

segment.source: Authorization Plugins allow Open Journal Systems to delegate user authentication tasks to other systems, such as LDAP servers.
segment.target: Plugin Otorisasi memungkinkan Open Journal Systems mendelegasikan otentikasi pengguna ke sistem eksternal, seperti server LDAP.

segment.source: Generic plugins are used to extend Open Journal Systems in a variety of ways that are not supported by the other plugin categories.
segment.target: Plugin Generik digunakan untuk menyediakan fungsi tambahan bagi Open Journal Systems melalui berbagai cara yang belum disediakan oleh plugin lainnya.

segment.source:
Proposed Creative Commons Copyright Notices

1. Proposed Policy for Journals That Offer Open Access

Authors who publish with this journal agree to the following terms:
  1. Authors retain copyright and grant the journal right of first publication with the work simultaneously licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution License that allows others to share the work with an acknowledgement of the work's authorship and initial publication in this journal.
  2. Authors are able to enter into separate, additional contractual arrangements for the non-exclusive distribution of the journal's published version of the work (e.g., post it to an institutional repository or publish it in a book), with an acknowledgement of its initial publication in this journal.
  3. Authors are permitted and encouraged to post their work online (e.g., in institutional repositories or on their website) prior to and during the submission process, as it can lead to productive exchanges, as well as earlier and greater citation of published work (See The Effect of Open Access).

2. Proposed Policy for Journals That Offer Delayed Open Access

Authors who publish with this journal agree to the following terms:
  1. Authors retain copyright and grant the journal right of first publication, with the work [SPECIFY PERIOD OF TIME] after publication simultaneously licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution License that allows others to share the work with an acknowledgement of the work's authorship and initial publication in this journal.
  2. Authors are able to enter into separate, additional contractual arrangements for the non-exclusive distribution of the journal's published version of the work (e.g., post it to an institutional repository or publish it in a book), with an acknowledgement of its initial publication in this journal.
  3. Authors are permitted and encouraged to post their work online (e.g., in institutional repositories or on their website) prior to and during the submission process, as it can lead to productive exchanges, as well as earlier and greater citation of published work (See The Effect of Open Access).
segment.target:
Contoh Pemberitahuan Pembuatan Creative Commons Copyright

1. Contoh Kebijakan Jurnal yang Menawarkan Open Access

Penulis yang mempublikasikan naskahnya di jurnal ini menyetujui hal-hal berikut:
  1. Hak cipta tetap pada penulis, penulis memberikan kepada jurnal hak penerbitan pertama dan sekaligus melisensi karyanya mengikuti Creative Commons Attribution License yang mengizinkan orang lain untuk berbagi karya dengan penghargaan terhadap hak kepenulisan dan penerbitan pertama di jurnal ini.
  2. Penulis bisa mengikuti kontrak tambahan lain untuk distribusi non-ekslusif bagi karyanya tersebut (contoh: mempostingnya ke repositori institusi atau menerbitkannya dalam sebuah buku), dengan penghargaan terhadap penerbitan pertama di jurnal ini.
  3. Penulis diizinkan dan didorong untuk mem-posting karya mereka online (contoh: di repositori institusi atau di website mereka) sebelum dan selama proses penyerahan, karena dapat mengarahkan ke pertukaran produktif, seperti halnya sitiran yang lebih awal dan lebih banyak dari karya yang diterbitkan. (Lihat The Effect of Open Access).

2. Contoh Kebijakan Jurnal yang Menawarkan Delayed Open Access

Penulis yang mempublikasikan naskahnya di jurnal ini menyetujui hal-hal berikut:
  1. Hak cipta tetap pada penulis, penulis memberikan kepada jurnal hak penerbitan pertama dan [TENTUKAN KURUN WAKTU] setelah penerbitan untuk melisensi karyanya mengikuti Creative Commons Attribution License yang mengizinkan orang lain untuk berbagi karya dengan penghargaan terhadap hak kepenulisan dan penerbitan pertama di jurnal ini.
  2. Penulis bisa mengikuti kontrak tambahan lain untuk distribusi non-ekslusif bagi karyanya tersebut (contoh: mempostingnya ke repositori institusi atau menerbitkannya dalam sebuah buku), dengan penghargaan terhadap penerbitan pertama di jurnal ini.
  3. Penulis diizinkan dan didorong untuk mem-posting karya mereka online (contoh: di repositori institusi atau di website mereka) sebelum dan selama proses penyerahan, karena dapat mengarahkan ke pertukaran produktif, seperti halnya sitiran yang lebih awal dan lebih banyak dari karya yang diterbitkan. (Lihat The Effect of Open Access).

segment.source:
Steps: Submission Queue > Submission Review > Submission Editing > Table of Contents.

Select a model for handling these aspects of the editorial process. (To designate a Managing Editor and Section Editors, go to Editors in Journal Management.)
segment.target:
Langkah: Antrian Penyerahan Naskah > Review Naskah > Pengeditan Naskah > Daftar Isi.

Pilih model untuk menangani aspek-aspek proses editorial ini. (Untuk menunjuk Editor Pelaksana dan Editor Bagian, lihat menu Editor di Manajemen Jurnal)

segment.source:
To enable readers to locate online versions of the work cited by an author, the following options are available.

  1. Add a Reading Tool

    The Journal Manager can add "Find References" to the Reading Tools that accompany published items, which enables readers to paste a reference's title and then search pre-selected scholarly databases for the cited work.

  2. Embed Links in the References

    The Layout Editor can add a link to references that can be found online by using the following instructions (which can be edited).
segment.target:
Untuk memudahkan pembaca menemukan versi online yang disitasi seorang penulis, terdapat pilihan berikut.

  1. Tambahkan Alat Baca

    Manajer Jurnal dapat menambahkan pilihan "Cari Referensi" ke Alat Baca yang menyertai naskah yang diterbitkan, sehingga pembaca dapat mengetikkan judul referensi dan mencari di pangkalan data publikasi ilmiah yang telah dipilih.

  2. Berikan Tautan di Daftar Referensi

    Layout Editor dapat menambahkan tautan ke referensi yang dapat ditemukan online dengan mengikuti petunjuk berikut (dapat diedit).

segment.source:
Disable this user? This will prevent the user from logging into the system.
You may optionally provide the user with a reason for disabling their account.
segment.target:
Nonaktifkan pengguna ini? Pengguna tidak akan bisa login ke sistem.
Anda dapat memberi alasan penonaktifannya kepada pengguna.

segment.source:
Sorry, you do not have administrative rights over this user. This may be because:
  • The user is a site administrator
  • The user is active in journals you do not manage
This task must be performed by a site administrator.
segment.target:
Maaf, Anda tidak mempunya hak administratif pada pengguna ini. Hal ini mungkin karena:
  • Pengguna adalah administrator situs
  • Pengguna aktif di jurnal yang tidak Anda kelola
Tugas ini harus dilakukan oleh administrator situs.

segment.source:
1. Highlighted items indicate action is required by an editor, labelled as follows:
    • A Reviewer has been assigned but not notified by email
    • All Reviewers have returned with their comments, but no decision is recorded
    • Author has uploaded a revised manuscript
    • Reviewer is overdue to confirm peer review invitation
    • Reviewer is overdue to complete review
  2. "Due" is filled in when reviewer accepts request to review; it displays number of weeks to review's due date or (-) weeks that it is overdue.
segment.target:
1. Item yang ditandai menunjukkan perlu dilakukan tindakan oleh editor, dengan label sebagai berikut:
    • Seorang reviewer telah ditugaskan namun belum diberitahu via email
    • Semua reviewer telah mengumpulkan hasil review beserta komentarnya namun belum ada keputusan
    • Penulis telah mengunggah naskah yang telah direvisi
    • Reviewer telah melampaui tenggat konfirmasi undangan peer review
    • Reviewer telah melampaui tenggat penyelesaian review
  2. "Tenggat" dicatat ketika reviewer menerima permohonan untuk mereview; ini menunjukkan jumlah minggu sebelum tanggal tenggat atau (-) minggu setelah tenggat terlampaui.

segment.source:
1. Highlighted items indicate action is required by an editor, labelled as follows:
    • An action is required in the copyediting stage
    • An action is required in the layout editing stage
    • An action is required in the proofreading stage
segment.target:
1. Item yang ditandai menunjukkan perlu dilakukan tindakan oleh editor, dengan label sebagai berikut:
    • Perlu tindakan di tahap copyediting
    • Perlu tindakan di tahap layout editing
    • Perlu tindakan di tahap proofreading

segment.source: Notifying this copy editor again will restart their assignment. Are you sure you wish to do this?
segment.target: Memberitahu lagi copy editor ini akan memulai ulang tugas mereka. Apakah Anda yakin ingin melakukannya?

segment.source: Notifying this layout editor again will restart their assignment. Are you sure you wish to do this?
segment.target: Memberitahu lagi editor layout ini kan memulai ulang tugas mereka. Apakah Anda yakin ingin melakukannya?

segment.source: Notifying this proofreader again will restart their assignment. Are you sure you wish to do this?
segment.target: Memberitahu lagi proofreader ini akan memulai ulang tugas mereka. Apakah Anda yakin ingin melakukannya?

segment.source: Enroll an Existing User As Reviewer
Invalid image format. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, and .png.
segment.target: Format gambar invalid. Format yang diterima adalah .gif, .jpg, dan .png.

segment.source: This galley will be available at a separate website.
segment.target: Galley ini tersedia di situs luar.

segment.source: Submission will be made available, if and when reviewer agrees to undertake review
segment.target: Naskah hanya dapat diakses jika reviewer bersedia mereview

segment.source: Type or paste in review comments here
segment.target: Ketik atau tempel komentar review di sini

segment.source: (If you want to annotate the file, for the editor, save on your hard drive and use Browse/Upload.)
segment.target: (Jika Anda ingin menambahkan anotasi pada file, untuk editor, simpan di hard drive dan gunakan Telusur/Unggah.)

segment.source: The Review Guidelines will provide reviewers with criteria for judging a submission's suitability for publication in the journal, and can include any special instructions for preparing an effective and helpful review. In conducting the review, reviewers are presented with with two open text boxes, the first "for author and editor," and the second "for editor." Alternatively, the Journal Manager can create a peer review form under Review Forms. In all cases, editors will have the option of including the reviews in corresponding with the author.
segment.target: Panduan Review akan memberi Reviewer kriteria untuk menilai kelayakan naskah untuk diterbitkan, dan dapat mencakup instruksi khusus apapun untuk menyiapkan review yang efektif. Dalam melakukan review, reviewer dihadapkan dengan dua kotak teks terbuka, yang pertama "untuk penulis dan editor", dan yang kedua "untuk editor". Sebagai alternatif, manajer jurnal dapat membuat form peer review di bawah Form Review. Dalam semua kasus, editor akan mempunyai pilihan termasuk menyertakan review dalam korespondensi dengan penulis.

segment.source: as to whether you will undertake the review.
If you are going to do the review, consult Reviewer Guidelines below.
segment.target: Jika Anda akan melakukan review, lihat Panduan Reviewer di bawah ini.

segment.source: Click on file names to download and review (on screen or by printing) the files associated with this submission.
segment.target: Klik di nama file untuk mengunduh dan mereview (di layar atau dengan mencetak) file yang berkaitan dengan naskah ini.

segment.source: Declare whether or not you have competing interests with regard to this research (see CI Policy).
segment.target: Sebutkan ada tidaknya konflik kepentingan Anda dengan penelitian ini (lihatCI Policy).

segment.source: Click on icon to enter (or paste) your review of this submission.
segment.target: Klik di ikon untuk memasukkan review Anda terhadap naskah ini.

segment.source: In addition, you can upload files for the editor and/or author to consult.
segment.target: Sebagai tambahan, Anda dapat mengunggah file untuk menjadi acuan editor dan/atau penulis.

segment.source: Select a recommendation and submit the review to complete the process. You must enter a review or upload a file before selecting a recommendation.
segment.target: Pilih rekomendasi dan serahkan hasil review untuk menyelesaikan proses. Anda harus memasukkan review atau mengunggah file sebelum memilih rekomendasi.

segment.source: Set or adjust the reviewer recommendation.
No recommendation was selected. You must choose a recommendation to submit.
segment.target: Tidak ada rekomendasi dipilih. Anda harus memilih satu rekomendasi untuk diserahkan.

segment.source: Once you have recorded a decision you will no longer be able to make changes to this review. Are you sure you wish to continue?
segment.target: Saat Anda sudah menyimpan keputusan, Anda tidak akan bisa membuat perubahan untuk review ini. Apakah Anda yakin untuk melanjutkan?

segment.source:
To upload a manuscript to this journal, complete the following steps.

  1. On this page, click Browse (or Choose File) which opens a Choose File window for locating the file on the hard drive of your computer.
  2. Locate the file you wish to submit and highlight it.
  3. Click Open on the Choose File window, which places the name of the file on this page.
  4. Click Upload on this page, which uploads the file from the computer to the journal's web site and renames it following the journal's conventions.
  5. Once the submission is uploaded, click Save and Continue at the bottom of this page.
segment.target:
Untuk mengunggah naskah ke jurnal, lakukan langkah-langkah berikut.

  1. Pada halaman ini, klik Telusuri (atau Pilih File) yang akan membuka jendela Pilih File untuk mengambil file dari hard drive komputer Anda.
  2. Cari dan pilih file yang Anda hendak Anda kirim.
  3. Klik tombol Buka pada jendela Pilih File, yang akan menempatkan nama file pada halaman ini.
  4. Klik tombol Unggah pada halaman ini, untuk mengunggah file dari komputer ke situs jurnal dan ubah nama file sesuai peraturan jurnal ini.
  5. Setelah naskah berhasil di unggah, klik tombol Simpan dan Lanjutkan.

segment.source: Request email cannot be sent until a Review Version is in place.
segment.target: Email tidak bisa dikirim sampai Versi Review ada.

segment.source: Request email cannot be sent until file is selected for copyediting in Editor Decision, Review page.
segment.target: Email tidak bisa dikirim sampai file dipilih untuk proses copyedit dalam Keputusan Editor, halaman Review.

segment.source: Request email cannot be sent until file is uploaded for copyediting.
segment.target: Email tidak bisa dikirim sampai file telah diunggah untuk proses copyedit.

segment.source: None (Upload final copyedit version as Layout Version prior to sending request)
segment.target: Tidak ada (Unggah versi copyedit akhir sebagai Versi Layout sebelum mengirim permintaan)

segment.source:
These comments can be shared with the author.
(After saving, further comments can be added.)
segment.target:
Komentar ini dapat dibagi dengan penulis.
(Setelah menyimpan, dapat ditambahkan komentar lebih lanjut.)

segment.source: After sending, present an editable BCC copy to send to reviewers.
segment.target: Setelah mengirim, tampilkan salinan BCC yang dapat diedit untuk dikirim ke reviewer.

segment.source: Select a journal to register with:
There are no journals you may register with on this site.
segment.target: Tidak ada jurnal yang dapat Anda daftar di situs ini.

segment.source: This journal is currently not accepting user registrations.
segment.target: Jurnal sedang tidak menerima pendaftaran pengguna.

segment.source: The password you entered is not long enough.
segment.target: Kata sandi yang Anda masukkan kurang panjang.

segment.source: Notified by email on publication of an issue of the journal.
segment.target: Beritahu melalui email saat ada terbitan baru.

segment.source: Notified by email when an issue of the journal is made open access.
segment.target: Beritahu melalui email saat terbitan jurnal dibuat Open Access.

segment.source: Able to submit items to the journal.
Willing to conduct peer review of submissions to the journal.
segment.target: Bersedia melakukan proses peer review naskah yang diserahkan jurnal.

segment.source: Willing to conduct peer review of submissions to the site.
segment.target: Bersedia melakukan proses peer review naskah untuk penerbit.

segment.source: Identify reviewing interests (substantive areas and research methods):
segment.target: Sebutkan bidang review (area substantif dan metode penelitian):

segment.source: Yes, I would like to be notified of new publications and announcements for all journals that I registered with.
Yes, I agree to have my data collected and stored according to this journal's privacy statement.
You must consent to the privacy statement for any journal with which you are registering.
You must consent to this site's privacy statement.
Active and expired subscriptions are displayed below along with their expiration date. In addition, the following status information may be included with each subscription.
segment.target: Langganan aktif dan yang sudah berakhir ditampilkan di bawah ini bersama dengan tanggal berakhir. Sebagai tambahan, informasi status berikut ini terdapat di tiap langganan.

segment.source: Additional information is needed before the subscription can be activated
segment.target: Diperlukan informasi tambahan sebelum langganan diaktifkan

segment.source: Subscription must be reviewed before it can be activated
segment.target: Langganan harus direview sebelum dapat diaktifkan

segment.source: Manual payment has been initiated but not yet received
segment.target: Pembayaran manual telah dimulai tapi belum diterima

segment.source: An online payment has been initiated but canceled or not completed
segment.target: Pembayaran online telah dimulai tapi dibatalkan atau tidak selesai

segment.source: The selected subscription type requires membership information.
segment.target: Tipe langganan yang dipilih memerlukan informasi keanggotaan.

segment.source: Please select a valid subscription type.
This user account already has an individual subscription.
segment.target: Akun pengguna ini sudah memiliki langganan individu.

segment.source: Membership information if required for the selected subscription type.
segment.target: Informasi keanggotaan dibutuhkan untuk tipe langganan yang dipilih.

segment.source:
If a domain is entered here, IP ranges are optional.
Valid values are domain names (e.g. lib.sfu.ca).
segment.target:
Jika domain dimasukkan di sini, IP range opsional.
Nilai valid adalah nama domain (contoh lib.sfu.ca).

segment.source: The selected subscription type requires a domain and/or an IP range for subscription authentication.
segment.target: Tipe langganan yang dipilih memerlukan domain dan/atau IP range untuk otentikasi langganan.

segment.source:
If IP ranges are entered here, the domain is optional.
Valid values include an IP address (e.g. 142.58.103.1), IP range (e.g. 142.58.103.1 - 142.58.103.4), IP range with wildcard '*' (e.g. 142.58.*.*), and an IP range with CIDR (e.g. 142.58.100.0/24).
segment.target:
Jika IP ranges dimasukkan di sini, domain bersifat opsional.
Nilai valid termasuk alamat IP (contoh 142.58.103.1), IP range (contoh. 142.58.103.1 - 142.58.103.4), IP range with wildcard '*' (contoh 142.58.*.*), and an IP range with CIDR (contoh 142.58.100.0/24).

segment.source: Please enter a valid IP range.

Search tips:
  • Search terms are case-insensitive
  • Common words are ignored
  • By default only articles containing all terms in the query are returned (i.e., AND is implied)
  • Combine multiple words with OR to find articles containing either term; e.g., education OR research
  • Use parentheses to create more complex queries; e.g., archive ((journal OR conference) NOT theses)
  • Search for an exact phrase by putting it in quotes; e.g., "open access publishing"
  • Exclude a word by prefixing it with - or NOT; e.g. online -politics or online NOT politics
  • Use * in a term as a wildcard to match any sequence of characters; e.g., soci* morality would match documents containing "sociological" or "societal"
segment.target:
Tip Pencarian:
  • Istilah pencarian tidak mempedulikan besar-kecilnya huruf
  • Kata-kata umum diabaikan
  • Secara default hanya artikel yang berisi semua istilah dalam query akan ditampilkan
  • Gabungkan beberapa kata dengan ATAU untuk mencari artikel yang berisi salah satu istilah; contoh: pendidikan ATAU penelitian
  • Gunakan tanda kurung tutup untuk menggunakan pencarian kompleks; contoh: arsip ((jurnal ATAU konferensi) BUKAN tesis)
  • Pencarian untuk frase utuh dengan meletakkannya di antara tanda petik dua; contoh: "penerbitan akses terbuka"atau "open access publishing"
  • Pengecualian kata dengan memberi awalan tanda (-) atau BUKAN; contoh: online -politik atau online BUKAN politik
  • Gunakan tanda bintang (*) dalam istilah untuk menghasilkan semua urutan karakter; contoh: soci* morality akan cocok dengan dokumen yang berisi "sociological" atau "societal"

segment.source: The PDF file you selected should load here if your Web browser has a PDF reader plugin installed (for example, a recent version of Adobe Acrobat Reader).
segment.target: File PDF yang Anda pilih akan tampil di sini bila browser Anda memiliki PDF reader plug-in (misalnya, versi mutakhir Adobe Acrobat Reader).

segment.source:
The file you selected should begin downloading automatically. If it does not, click the link below. Note that this file may require a special viewer or plugin to view.

If the file does not download automatically, click here.
segment.target:
File yang Anda pilih dapat meng-unggah secara otomatis. Jika tidak, klik tautan dibawah ini. Perhatikan file ini mungkin memerlukan plugin untuk dilihat.

Jika file tidak meng-unggah secara otomatis klik disini.
Jurnal yang dimasukkan di situs ini

segment.source: This journal has not published any issues.
segment.target: Jurnal ini belum mengeluarkan satu pun terbitan.

segment.source: Make a new submission to the {$name} section.

As part of the submission process, authors are required to check off their submission's compliance with all of the following items, and submissions may be returned to authors that do not adhere to these guidelines.
segment.target: Penulis yang ingin memasukkan naskah harus memperhatikan poin-poin di bawah ini. Jika naskah tidak sesuai dengan persyaratan yang telah dicantumkan, ada kemungkinan naskah tersebut akan dikembalikan.

segment.source: This journal charges the following author fees.
segment.target: Jurnal ini mengenakan biaya penulis berikut ini.

segment.source: The contents of this journal will be available in an open access format
segment.target: Isi jurnal ini akan tersedia dalam format Open Access

segment.source: month(s) after an issue is published.

This journal uses Open Journal Systems {$ojsVersion}, which is open source journal management and publishing software developed, supported, and freely distributed by the Public Knowledge Project under the GNU General Public License.
segment.target: Jurnal ini menggunakan Open Journal Systems {$ojsVersion}, yang merupakan perangkat lunak open source untuk pengelolaan dan penerbitan jurnal yang dikembangkan, didukung, dan didistribusikan bebas oleh Public Knowledge Project di bawah GNU General Public License.

segment.source: This site uses Open Journal Systems {$ojsVersion}, which is open source journal management and publishing software developed, supported, and freely distributed by the Public Knowledge Project under the GNU General Public License.
segment.target: Situs ini menggunakan Open Journal Systems {$ojsVersion}, merupakan perangkat lunak open source untuk pengelolaan dan penerbitan jurnal yang dikembangkan, didukung, dan didistribusikan bebas oleh Public Knowledge Project di bawah GNU General Public License.

segment.source: Thank you for making a contribution. Your contribution is much appreciated.
segment.target: Terima kasih untuk kontribusi Anda. Kontribusi Anda sangat kami hargai.

segment.source: You must be logged in to make a payment.
segment.target: Anda harus login untuk melakukan pembayaran.

segment.source: Subscription or article purchase required to access item. To verify subscription, access previous purchase, or purchase article, log in to journal.
segment.target: Langganan atau pembelian artikel dibutuhkan untuk mengakses judul ini. Untuk verifikasi langganan, akses pembelian sebelumnya, atau untuk membeli artikel, silakan login ke jurnal.

segment.source: Subscription or issue purchase required to access item. To verify subscription, access previous purchase, or purchase issue, log in to journal.
segment.target: Langganan atau pembelian terbitan dibutuhkan untuk mengakses judul ini. Untuk verifikasi langganan, akses pembelian sebelumnya, atau untuk membeli terbitan, silakan login ke jurnal.

segment.source: You must be logged in to make a donation.
segment.target: Anda harus login untuk memberi donasi.

segment.source: Select this box if you've already sent your payment to the journal in order to finish the submission process. The submission will not be reviewed until the payment arrives. Click PAY NOW above to see the payment instructions.
segment.target: Pilih bila Anda telah mengirimkan pembayaran Anda ke jurnal untuk menyelesaikan penyerahan naskah. Penyerahan naskah tidak akan direview hingga pembayaran diterima. Klik BAYAR SEKARANG di atas untuk petunjuk pembayaran.

segment.source: The publication fee is due for payment.
A payment has been requested, but the request has expired. Contact the Journal Manager for details.

OJS Version {$version}

Thank you for downloading the Public Knowledge Project's Open Journal Systems. Before proceeding, please read the README file included with this software. For more information about the Public Knowledge Project and its software projects, please visit the PKP web site. If you have bug reports or technical support inquiries about Open Journal Systems, see the support forum or visit PKP's online bug reporting system. Although the support forum is the preferred method of contact, you can also email the team at pkp.contact@gmail.com.

Upgrade

If you are upgrading an existing installation of OJS, click here to proceed.

Recommended system requirements

  • PHP >= {$phpRequiredVersion}; you are currently using PHP {$phpVersion}{$wrongPhpText}
  • MySQL >= 4.1 or PostgreSQL >= 9.1.5
  • Apache >= 1.3.2x or >= 2.0.4x or Microsoft IIS 6
  • Operating system: Any OS that supports the above software, including Linux, BSD, Solaris, Mac OS X, Windows

As PKP does not have the resources to test every possible combination of software versions and platforms, no guarantee of correct operation or support is implied.

Changes to these settings can be made after installation by editing the file config.inc.php in the base OJS directory, or using the site administration web interface.

Supported database systems

OJS has currently only been tested on MySQL and PostgreSQL, although other database management systems supported by ADOdb may work (in full or partially). Compatibility reports and/or code patches for alternative DBMSs can be sent to the OJS team.
segment.target:
Versi OJS {$version}

Terima kasih telah mengunduh Open Journal Systems dari Public Knowledge Project. Sebelum melanjutkan, silakan membaca README. File disertakan dalam perangkat lunak ini. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut tentang Public Knowledge Project dan perangkat lunak ini, silakan kunjungi laman web PKP. Jika Anda memiliki laporan bug atau memerlukan dukungan teknis mengenai OJS, lihat forum dukungan atau kunjungi PKP online Laporkan bug sistem. Selain itu Anda dapat menghubungi tim pengembang OJS melalui pkp.contact@gmail.com.

Upgrade

Jika Anda ingin mengupgrade instalasi OJS yang sudah ada, klik di sini.

Rekomendasi Sistem

  • PHP >= {$phpRequiredVersion}; saat ini Anda menggunakan PHP {$phpVersion}{$wrongPhpText}
  • MySQL >= 4.1 atau PostgreSQL >= 9.1.5
  • Apache >= 1.3.2x atau >= 2.0.4x atau Microsoft IIS 6
  • Sistem operasi: Semua sistem operasi yang mendukung piranti lunak di atas, termasuk Linux, BSD, Solaris, Mac OS X, Windows

Karena PKP tidak memiliki kemampuan untuk menguji seluruh kemungkinan kombinasi versi dan platform piranti lunak, tidak ada jaminan maupun dukungan untuk keberhasilan pemakaian piranti lunak ini.

Perubahan terhadap setting ini dapat dilakukan setelah instalasi dengan mengedit file config.inc.php di direktori OJS, atau menggunakan antarmuka Administrasi Situs.

Sistem Database yang Didukung

Saat ini OJS telah diuji hanya di sistem database MySQL dan PostgreSQL, walaupun mungkin dapat berjalan (penuh maupun parsial) di sistem manajemen database lain yang didukung oleh ADOdb. Laporan kompabilitas dan/atau patch kode DBMS alternatif dapat dikirimkan ke Tim OJS.

segment.source:
Pre-Installation Steps

1. The following files and directories (and their contents) must be made writable:

  • config.inc.php is writable (optional): {$writable_config}
  • public/ is writable: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ is writable: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ is writable: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ is writable: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db is writable: {$writable_db_cache}

2. A directory to store uploaded files must be created and made writable (see "File Settings" below).
segment.target:
Langkah Pra-Instalasi1. File dan direktori berikut (beserta isinya) harus "writable":

  • config.inc.php writable (opsional): {$writable_config}
  • public/ writable: {$writable_public}
  • cache/ writable: {$writable_cache}
  • cache/t_cache/ writable: {$writable_templates_cache}
  • cache/t_compile/ writable: {$writable_templates_compile}
  • cache/_db writable: {$writable_db_cache}

2. Buat direktori khusus untuk menyimpan file unggahan dan buat "writable" (lihat Pengaturan File di bawah ini)

segment.source:
OJS Version {$version}

Thank you for downloading the Public Knowledge Project's Open Journal Systems. Before proceeding, please read the README and UPGRADE files included with this software. For more information about the Public Knowledge Project and its software projects, please visit the PKP web site. If you have bug reports or technical support inquiries about Open Journal Systems, see the support forum or visit PKP's online bug reporting system. Although the support forum is the preferred method of contact, you can also email the team at pkp.contact@gmail.com.

It is strongly recommended that you back up your database, files directory, and OJS installation directory before proceeding.

If you are running in PHP Safe Mode, please ensure that the max_execution_time directive in your php.ini configuration file is set to a high limit. If this or any other time limit (e.g. Apache's "Timeout" directive) is reached and the upgrade process is interrupted, manual intervention will be required.
segment.target:
Versi OJS {$version}

Terima kasih telah mengunduh Open Journal Systems dari Public Knowledge Project. Sebelum melanjutkan, silakan membaca README dan UPGRADE yang disertakan dalam perangkat lunak ini. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut tentang Public Knowledge Project dan perangkat lunak ini, silakan kunjungi web site PKP. Jika Anda memiliki laporan bug atau butuh dukungan teknis mengenai OJS, lihat forum dukungan atau kunjungi PKP online Laporkan bug sistem. Selain itu Anda dapat mengontak tim pengembang OJS melalui pkp.contact@gmail.com.

Sangat disarankan agar Anda memback up database Anda, direktori file, dan direktori instalasi OJS sebelum melanjutkan.

Jika Anda menjalankan PHP Safe Mode, pastikan perintah max_execution_time di file konfigurasi php.ini diatur hingga batas tinggi. Jika batas ini atau batas lain (contoh: perintah "Timeout" Apache) telah terlewati dan proses upgrade terganggu, akan dibutuhkan intervensi manual.

segment.source:
For complete Unicode (UTF-8) support, select UTF-8 for all character set settings. Please note that full Unicode support requires PHP to be compiled with support for the mbstring library (enabled by default in most recent PHP installations). You may experience problems using extended character sets if your server does not meet these requirements.

Your server currently supports mbstring: {$supportsMBString}
segment.target:
Untuk dukungan lengkap Unicode (UTF-8), pilih UTF-8 untuk semua pengaturan karakter set. Perhatikan bahwa dukungan lengkap Unicode membutuhkan kompilasi PHP dengan dukungan terhadap pustaka mbstring (tersedia secara default pada instalasi PHP terbaru). Anda mungkin akan menemui masalah menggunakan set karakter lengkap jika server Anda tidak memenuhi persyaratan.

Server Anda sekarang support mbstring: {$supportsMBString}

segment.source: Your server currently allows file uploads: {$allowFileUploads}
segment.target: Server Anda saat ini mengijinkan unggah file: {$allowFileUploads}

segment.source: Your server currently allows a maximum file upload size of: {$maxFileUploadSize}
segment.target: Server Anda saat ini membatasi besar file yang diunggah maksimal: {$maxFileUploadSize}

segment.source: The primary language to use for this system. Please consult the OJS documentation if you are interested in support for languages not listed here.
segment.target: Bahasa utama yang digunakan untuk sistem ini. Mohon baca dokumentasi OJS jika Anda menghendaki bahasa yang tidak tercantum di daftar ini.

segment.source: Select any additional languages to support in this system. These languages will be available for use by journals hosted on the site. Additional languages can also be installed at any time from the site administration interface.
segment.target: Pilih bahasa-bahasa tambahan yang hendak didukung sistem ini. Bahasa-bahasa ini akan dapat digunakan oleh jurnal-jurnal yang dikelola di sistem ini. Bahasa tambahan dapat juga diinstal kapan saja dari antarmuka administrasi situs.

segment.source: Enter full pathname to an existing directory where uploaded files are to be kept. This directory should not be directly web-accessible. Please ensure that this directory exists and is writable prior to installation. Windows path names should use forward slashes, e.g. "C:/myjournal/files".
segment.target: Masukkan pathname lengkap direktori yang digunakan untuk menyimpan file yang diunggah. Direktori ini sebaiknya tidak bisa diakses langsung melalui web. Pastikan direktori ini sudah ada dan writable sebelum instalasi. Jendela pathname harus menggunakan forward slash (/), contoh "C:/myjournal/files".

segment.source: OJS requires access to a SQL database to store its data. See the system requirements above for a list of supported databases. In the fields below, provide the settings to be used to connect to the database.
segment.target: OJS membutuhkan akses ke database SQL untuk menyimpan datanya. Lihat persyaratan sistem di atas untuk mengetahui sistem database yang didukung. Di kolom berikut, isikan pengaturan yang diperlukan untuk koneksi ke database.

segment.source: Warning: If installation failed part way through database installation you may need to drop your OJS database or database tables before attempting to reinstall the database.
segment.target: Peringatan: Jika terjadi kegagalan saat instalasi database, Anda harus menghapus database OJS atau tabel yang sudah dibuat sebelum menginstal ulang database.

segment.source:
IMPORTANT!

The installer could not automatically overwrite the configuration file. Before attempting to use the system, please open config.inc.php in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.
segment.target:
PENTING!

Installer tidak bisa secara otomatis menimpa file konfigurasi. Sebelum mencoba untuk menggunakan sistem, buka config.inc.php menggunakan text editor dan ganti isinya dengan isi kolom berikut ini.

segment.source:
Installation of OJS has completed successfully.

To begin using the system, login with the username and password entered on the previous page.

If you wish to be part of the PKP community, you can:

  1. Read the PKP blog and follow the RSS feed for news and updates.
  2. Visit the support forum if you have questions or comments.
segment.target:
Instalasi OJS telah berhasil.

Untuk mulai menggunakan sistem, login dengan nama pengguna dan kata sandi yang dimasukkan di halaman sebelumnya.

Jika Anda ingin bergabung dengan komunitas PKP, Anda dapat:

  1. membaca blog PKP dan mengikuti RSS feed untuk berita dan update.
  2. mengunjungi forum dukungan jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan atau komentar.

segment.source:
Upgrade of OJS to version {$version} has completed successfully.

Don't forget to set the "installed" setting in your config.inc.php configuration file back to On.

If you haven't already registered and wish to receive news and updates, please register at http://pkp.sfu.ca/ojs/register. If you have questions or comments, please visit the support forum.
segment.target:
Upgrade OJS ke versi {$version} telah berhasil.

Jangan lupa untuk mengembalikan status "installed" ke On dalam file config.inc.php.

Jika Anda belum terdaftar dan ingin menerima berita dan update, silakan daftar di http://pkp.sfu.ca/ojs/register. Jika Anda memiliki pertanyaan atau komentar, silakan kunjungi forum dukungan.

segment.source: There is a new version of OJS available! You are currently using OJS {$currentVersion}. The most recent version is OJS {$latestVersion}. Please visit this page to download the most recent version and find upgrade instructions.
segment.target: Ada versi baru OJS! Anda saat ini menggunakan OJS {$currentVersion}. Versi terbaru adalah OJS {$latestVersion}. Silakan kunjungi laman ini untuk mengunduh versi terbaru dan membaca instruksi upgrade-nya.

segment.source: There is a new version of OJS available! You are currently using OJS {$currentVersion}. The most recent version is OJS {$latestVersion}. Please contact your Site Administrator ({$siteAdminName}, {$siteAdminEmail}) to notify them of this new release. More information can be found here.
segment.target: Ada versi baru OJS! Anda saat ini menggunakan OJS {$currentVersion}. Versi terbaru adalah OJS {$latestVersion}. Silakan hubungi Administrator Situs ({$siteAdminName}, {$siteAdminEmail}) untuk memberitahu mereka tentang versi baru ini. Informasi lebih lanjut dapat dibaca di sini.

segment.source: {$authorName} has revised article {$submissionId}. The new file ID is {$fileId}.
segment.target: {$authorName} telah merevisi naskah {$submissionId}. ID file baru adalah {$fileId}.

segment.source: {$reviewerName} has been unassigned from reviewing submission {$submissionId} for review round {$round}.
segment.target: {$reviewerName} telah dibebastugaskan dari review naskah {$submissionId} untuk ronde review {$round}.

segment.source: The round {$round} review by {$reviewerName} for submission {$submissionId} has been initiated.
segment.target: Ronde {$round} review oleh {$reviewerName} untuk naskah {$submissionId} telah dimulai.

segment.source: {$reviewerName} has been rated for the round {$round} review of submission {$submissionId}.
segment.target: {$reviewerName} telah dinilai untuk ronde {$round} review naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: The due date for the round {$round} review of submission {$submissionId} by {$reviewerName} has been set to {$dueDate}.
segment.target: Tenggat waktu untuk ronde {$round} review naskah {$submissionId} oleh {$reviewerName} adalah tanggal {$dueDate}.

segment.source: The recommendation for the round {$round} review of submission {$submissionId} by {$reviewerName} has been set.
segment.target: Rekomendasi untuk ronde {$round} review naskah {$submissionId} oleh {$reviewerName} telah ditetapkan.

segment.source: The recommendation for the round {$round} review of submission {$submissionId} has been set by the editor, {$editorName}, on behalf of the reviewer, {$reviewerName}.
segment.target: Rekomendasi untuk ronde {$round} review naskah {$submissionId} telah ditetapkan oleh editor, {$editorName}, atas nama reviewer, {$reviewerName}.

segment.source: The submission {$submissionId} has been resubmitted for review.
segment.target: Naskah {$submissionId} telah dikirim ulang untuk review.

segment.source: {$reviewerName} has declined the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId}.
{$reviewerName} has accepted the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId}.
{$userName} has declined the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId} on behalf of {$reviewerName}.
segment.target: Atas nama {$reviewerName}, {$userName} telah menolak ronde {$round} review naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: {$userName} has accepted the round {$round} review for submission {$submissionId} on behalf of {$reviewerName}.
segment.target: Atas nama {$reviewerName}, {$userName} telah menerima ronde {$round} review naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: The Editor, {$userName}, has uploaded a review file for round {$round} of submission {$submissionId} on behalf of the reviewer, {$reviewerName}.
segment.target: Atas nama reviewer {$reviewerName}, Editor, {$userName}, telah mengunggah file review untuk ronde {$round} dari naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: A reviewer file has been uploaded.
An editor decision ({$decision}) for article {$submissionId} was recorded by {$editorName}.
segment.target: Keputusan editor ({$decision}) untuk naskah {$submissionId} telah dicatat oleh {$editorName}.

segment.source: An editor recommendation ({$decision}) for article {$submissionId} was recorded by {$editorName}.
Copyediting on submission {$submissionId} has been commenced by {$copyeditorName}.
The default copyedit file has been chosen.
{$copyeditorName} has completed the initial copy edit of submission {$submissionId}.
{$copyeditorName} has completed the final copy edit of submission {$submissionId}.
{$copyeditorName} has been assigned to copyedit submission {$submissionId}.
A copyeditor version of the submission file has been uploaded.
segment.target: File naskah versi copyeditor telah diunggah.

segment.source: A version of the submission file copyedited by the author has been uploaded.
segment.target: File naskah versi copyedit penulis telah diunggah.

segment.source: {$editorName} has been assigned as layout editor for submission {$submissionId}.
segment.target: {$editorName}telah ditugaskan sebagai editor layout untuk naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: {$editorName} has been unassigned as layout editor for submission {$submissionId}.
segment.target: {$editorName} telah dibebastugaskan sebagai editor layout untuk naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: {$editorName} has completed layout editing for submission {$submissionId}.
segment.target: {$editorName} telah menyelesaikan pengeditan layout untuk naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: The metadata for this article was modified by {$editorName}.
segment.target: Metadata untuk artikel ini telah dimodifikasi oleh {$editorName}.

segment.source: An editor version of the submission file has been uploaded.
segment.target: File naskah versi editor telah diunggah.

segment.source: The submission {$submissionId} has been restored to the queue.
{$editorName} has been assigned as editor to submission {$submissionId}.
segment.target: {$editorName} telah ditugaskan sebagai editor untuk naskah {$submissionId}.

segment.source: A new article, "{$title}," has been submitted.
A comment has been left on the editor decision for "{$title}."
segment.target: Ada komentar terhadap keputusan editor bagi "{$title}."

segment.source: A galley has been modified for "{$title}."
A new announcement has been created.
A review form review has been submitted for "{$title}."
An editor has made a comment on "{$title}."
A reader has made a comment on "{$title}"
A new article has been submitted to which an editor needs to be assigned.
segment.target: Naskah baru telah diserahkan, perlu penugasan editor.

segment.source: Assign a user to create galleys using the Assign link in the Participants list.
segment.target: Tugaskan pengguna untuk membuat galley menggunakan tautan Tambah di daftar Partisipan.

segment.source: Access denied! You have not been assigned as a copyeditor to this article.
segment.target: Akses ditolak! Anda belum ditugaskan menjadi copyeditor untuk naskah ini.

segment.source: You are trying to access an article that is not part of your section.
segment.target: Anda mencoba mengakses naskah yang bukan bagian Anda.

segment.source: Invalid copyeditor submission or no copyeditor submission requested!
segment.target: Kiriman copyeditor invalid atau tidak ada permintaan kiriman copyeditor!
Memuat daftar mata uang "{$filename}" dari XML

segment.source: This submission is currently awaiting approval before it will appear in the issue.
segment.target: Naskah ini masih menunggu persetujuan sebelum muncul di terbitan.

segment.source: Please choose an article file to download.
This search implementation does not allow per-journal re-indexing.
segment.target: Pencarian ini tidak memungkinkan pengindeksan ulang per jurnal.

segment.source: The given journal path "{$journalPath}" could not be resolved to a journal.
segment.target: Path jurnal yang diberikan "{$journalPath}" tidak mengarah ke jurnal apapun.

segment.source: {$editorName} has taken the edit process for the article {$submissionId}.
Choose how to order articles in this category.
